title: WHAT THE FUCK RIOT
body:
Permanent Account Suspension

cdhus,

Your account has received a permanent suspension following an extensive audit of in-game behavior within recent League of Legends matches.

Here are some chat logs that were identified as negative by other players in the community.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
WTF
WTF
EZ YASUO
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
MY ACCOUNT GOT FUCKING PERMABANNED FOR SAYING THAT?ARE YOU SERIOUS?UNBANN MY ACCOUNT

replies.body:
That chat posted is drastically different than what was sent to you. 

A lot of content is missing from the single game emailed to you, and two more games were provided to you in the in-client reform card.

If you'd like, I can post the chat logs here for you, or you can contact player support.
It is time to pull out the Savagery of Riot Tantram!  I really did enjoy seeing the other ones you posted to prove your point.
{{summoner:11}}

There are other logs in the client, probably.  Also, you did not get banned for that one game. You got punished for that one game, perhaps. What you got banned for, was a pattern of bad behavior. You hit the other tiers of punishments, did not change your behavior, so the next time you're punished it was a permaban.
But what did i do to get punished?

> [{quoted}](name=cdhus,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=2MBTxTfF,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-05-27T12:11:30.537+0000)
>
> But what did i do to get punished?

Saying EZ is attempt to say EASY without being logged by punishment system, What u failed to realize it also detects EZ. Saying EASY or EZ is ultimate way to attempt to humiliate opponent and its considered very toxic and unsportsmanlike by most of community and RIOT. Its as if u would go to opposing player during football match and start laughing at him cause he lost instead of shaking hands like a true sportsman. And before u try to pull EZ MEANS EZREAL card, i checked your match history, that game didnt have EZREAL in it. So u clearly used it as an insult. Yes, your ban is deserved. Bye.

You said three things in that log and all three things appear unsportsmanlike to me.

At the tier of punishment you were previously at, you had very little leeway to act toxic.
Ive got a feeling there was more to it then that. Send in a support ticket to get the specifics.
You can actually get banned for "gg ez noobs"

I say that due to this part:
> Your account has received a permanent suspension following an extensive audit of in-game behavior within recent League of Legends matches.

> [{quoted}](name=Bow hunter 16,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=2MBTxTfF,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-27T11:25:04.804+0000)
>
> I say that due to this part:

That's just a copy/paste response from riot. Permabans aren't even looked over by staff, they're automated.
On some rare occasions they are though.
They say that every time you get a ban.
I said that because the enemy yasuo was showing off and flaming and we ended up wining the game thats why i said ez at the end.Plus it's the only fuckin thing i said all game

> [{quoted}](name=Bow hunter 16,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=2MBTxTfF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-27T11:17:23.023+0000)
>
> Ive got a feeling there was more to it then that. Send in a support ticket to get the specifics.

LOL.. Yea... This. So much this.

Sounds like a yes vote in the poll to me...

hmm .. pre game chat .. post game chat .. trolling /grief .. ebaying ..

Those are a few things I can think of right now that can get you permaed without it being in the logs.
Didn't do any of those things plus i think riot would have said it not just send the in game log

If people reported you for griefing and verbal abuse, and you were banned for griefing, then you will still get chat logs. 

One of those things that are messed up in communication through the automatic system.

I am sorry this looks so insanely incomplete. Rioter's are not idiots, and we are not either, there is no way you got banned for just that. There is no possible benefit of hiding info from us, there is nothing for you to lose, if you want any advice or help, be honest and post all your logs. If your missing the logs from your other toxic games, make a support ticket!
I dont want no Red Tracker... I want a Tantram tracker... And maybe Katey Khaos...

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=2MBTxTfF,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-05-27T18:05:39.961+0000)
>
> That chat posted is drastically different than what was sent to you. 
> 
> A lot of content is missing from the single game emailed to you, and two more games were provided to you in the in-client reform card.
> 
> If you'd like, I can post the chat logs here for you, or you can contact player support.

PWNED

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
Those 3 lines you excerpted from the full chat log are still toxic. Good effort, though.

da fuck is that suppose to be

~~~~~
WTF
WTF
EZ YASUO
~~~~~
:D

I would say it's either pre/post game chat which doesn't show in the logs, or you went into a game while the previous game was getting reviewed so instead of it showing that game it only showed your most recent game! Either that or you aren't showing us your full logs!
Did you log on your client
saying ez deserves a permaban. unless u mean ezreal

Seems to me everyone in this game is a bunch of sensitive individuals who got picked on in school and now this is your only way to mess with people and to control a system since you cant control anything in real life. good going riot games you guys are pretty cool and awesome to ban people who clearly spent money on your product.
This is incredibly specific, are you describing yourself?

Real talk through, this game has been pandering to 12 year olds with fragile egos at a historic level. Meanwhile they can troll, intentionally feed, dc, and grief all they want, but because they dont say anything in chat they get the benefit of the doubt. Having acess to mommys credit card doesnt hurt either
